title: Introducing: 'Fantasy Football Today in 5' podcast
description:
We're expanding! Fantasy Football Today in 5, the fastest way to keep up with fantasy football, debuts on Monday, August 31. Download and subscribe now to get the first episode in your feed as soon as it is released!
For more than a decade, Fantasy Football Today has been delivering league-winning analysis and advice as part of the CBS Sports Podcast Network. Now, we're coming at you fast with a brand new feed (don't worry, this feed will stay the same). The Fantasy Football Today in 5 podcast is your audio outlet for fantasy news and advice in 5 minutes or fewer. It'll feature familiar voices that you know and love - Adam Aizer, Jamey Eisenberg, Dave Richard, Heath Cummings and Ben Gretch - as the guys break down what matters most to help you win your league in a quick-hitting format. FFT in 5 will be available first thing in the morning, Monday through Friday so you'll know the moves to make in the time it takes to brew a pot of coffee or walk the dog.  
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
